attributes.action: British public wish to force a vote of no confidence in our current government.
attributes.additional_details:
The overwhelming sentiment of the British people, from all walks of life, is that we zero confidence in Keir Starmer and the Labour government to effectively represent our needs or wishes. We believe their inept leadership is, and will continue to have, an extremely detrimental effect on the UK. 
We cannot wait another 4 years until the next election, while they continue to destroy, divide and alienate our great nation.
attributes.background: Active a vote of no confidence of the current labour government, in the name of the British people. Forcing an early general election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence in the Government. This is set out in the Committee's standards: https://petition.parliament.uk/help

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
